title: Fantasy Music Package - Orchestral
description: Fantasy orchestral music for wilderness, caves, and towns.
longDescription:
This Package includes 21 different pieces of music, many of which contain an intro, a loop, and an outro. There are over 40 minutes of music.


Sampler Video:


https://youtu.be/l36YJ4jZbVE


Wilderness:


  • Explore Ambience - Intro
  • Explore Ambience - Loop
  • Explore Ambience - Outro
  • Forsaken Wilds - Intro
  • Forsaken Wilds - Loop
  • Forsaken Wilds - Outro
  • Respite
  • The Journey Home
  • The Summit

Cinematic:


  • The Tower
  • Reprise

Taverns:


  1. The Blundering Bard - Intro
  2. The Blundering Bard - Loop
  3. The Blundering Bard - Outro
  4. The Blundering Bard


Towns:


  • City Explore
  • The Market 1 - Loop
  • The Market 2 - Intro
  • The Market 2 - Loop
  • The Market 2 - Outro
  • The Great City - Intro
  • The Great City - Loop
  • The Great City - Outro
  • The Great City

Boss Fights:


  • Bandit - Intro
  • Bandit - Loop
  • Bandit - Outro
  • Treacherous Beast - Intro
  • Treacherous Beast - Loop
  • Treacherous Beast Outro

Caves:


  • Cave Ambience 1 - Intro
  • Cave Ambience 1 - Loop
  • Cave Ambience 1 - Outro
  • Cave Ambience 2 - Intro
  • Cave Ambience 2 - Loop
  • Cave Ambience 2 - Outro
  • Cave Ambience 3 - Intro
  • Cave Ambience 3 - Loop
  • Cave Ambience 3 - Outro
  • Cave Ambience 3

Bonus:


  • Elven Sunrise
  • Fylgja
  • Nokken
  • Sounds of Solitude

Sound Effects:


  • Quest update 1
  • Quest Update 2
  • Boss Defeat
  • Rank up 1 - Lighthearted


Composer: Hudson Link
technicalDetails:
Details:


  • 21 different pieces equaling over 40 minutes (many of which include intros and outros).
  • 3 sound effect files
  • A total of 34 Wavs
  • 1.14 GB
  • 44.1 kHz
  • Bit Rate: 24 bit and 32 bit.
  • All tracks are 32 bit, except:
  • Quest update 1 (24 bit)
  • Quest Update 2 (24 bit)
  • The Journey Home (24 bit)
